DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine treatment effect sequential combination aerobic exercise cognitive training cognitive function , physiological marker , daily function , physical function , social participation quality life stroke patient cognitive decline . The investigator hypothesize : ( 1 ) sequential training protocol improve outcome measure compare single mode training ; ( 2 ) treatment effect retain 6-month follow-up .
DOC.brief_title: Synergistic Effects Aerobic Exercise Cognitive Training Cognition Stroke Patients With Cognitive Decline
DOC.criteria: 1 . Ischemic hemorrhagic stroke occur least 6 month prior enrollment 2 . Age range 20 90 year 3 . MMSE score ≥ 19 4 . MoCA < 26 5 . Self informantreported memory cognitive complaint CDR scale ≤ 0.5 6 . Able follow study instruction 7 . Adequate cardiopulmonary function perform aerobic exercise 8 . Able walk without assistive device 1 . Unstable medical history ( e.g. , recent myocardial infarction ) might limit participation 2 . Concomitant neurological disorder ( e.g. , Parkinson 's disease , amyotrophic lateral sclerosis , multiple sclerosis ) 3 . Current participation another interventional trial
